text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This heated two-minute battle will<n>make you forget the
coming winter<n>cold, because the one you've waited<n>for is
back for today's autumn Tenno<n>Sho!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown champion, Narita<n>Brian, who was injured
right before<n>the spring Tenno Sho, is ready to<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's overwhelmingly favored to<n>win, but how exactly will
today's race<n>turn out?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting since spring! Bring<n>out the Brian!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
She might break another record<n>today! I can't wait another
second!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
We didn't get to train as much<n>because of your injury, but
you're<n>looking good today.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What's most important though is<n>you've got that same will
to run.<n>Now's your chance to let loose!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What's most important though is<n>you've got that same will
to run.<n>Now's your chance to let loose!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Right...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll give it all I have.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They've turned the final corner into<n>the stretch! Every racer
is making a<n>dash for the finish!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What's this?! Has Narita Brian run<n>out of stamina? She's
being passed<n>by the rear!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her return to racing that autumn turns<n>out to be unlike
anything we had<n>imagined. She places twelfth.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right, you're looking good. Your<n>legs aren't having any
trouble moving.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I was afraid she might not have<n>completely healed yet, but
she's<n>doing well during training.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Okay, next, let's simulate doing the<n>final straight. The Japan
Cup is<n>next—that last part of the Tokyo<n>Racecourse is a
long one.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You want to focus on... my final<n>sprint...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Mind if we switch to something<n>different? I'll do sprinting
on my own<n>later.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sure, I guess...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The Japan Cup is longer than the<n>autumn Tenno Sho, so I
want to work<n>on my pacing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Got it. Let's do some pace training<n>then.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll get to it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's the first time she's ever<n>asked to change the
training routine.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I heard she got better... but seeing her<n>now...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Mayano! Training's about to start!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay! Coming right over!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Something's bothering me about how<n>Brian's running. It's
not as exciting<n>as that time at the Hanshin<n>Daishoten.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Brian...

text_block_list.name: TV Host
text_block_list.text:
We asked the fans who were there in<n>person what they
thought of Narita<n>Brian's run.

text_block_list.name: TV Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Logically, this all makes sense. She'd<n>been recuperating for
six whole<n>months after all.

text_block_list.name: TV Fan B
text_block_list.text: Exactly! Brian will be back to her old<n>self by the next race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The TV and newspapers are all<n>saying that her loss was
'cause of<n>the injury.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
There's also the fact that it's<n>incredibly difficult to return in
peak<n>shape after such a long absence. Her<n>instincts could
be temporarily dulled.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
After seeing her blow away the<n>competition so many times,
it's easy<n>to forget something so simple.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Winning a race after coming back<n>from an injury is no easy
task. We<n>just need to get her reacclimated<n>before the
Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Agreed. We still have time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While I can't say I'm not concerned,<n>her running has
always topped what I<n>thought she could do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But... the idea that her hiatus was the<n>sole reason she lost
isn't sitting right<n>with me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sorry, Trainer. But I've made my<n>choice.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm going to keep running as the new<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the last 200 meters! "Queen of<n>the Amazons" Hishi
Amazon is in hot<n>pursuit of the lead! Narita Brian's<n>
struggling in the final straight!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon finishes in a close<n>second! Narita Brian's
fallen behind<n>and finishes sixth!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Like the autumn Tenno Sho, it looks<n>like she just couldn't
go the distance<n>in the Japan Cup today!
